Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.lightmodel

Class LightMatch

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.observer.ViewObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.view.lightmodel.LightMatch
public class LightMatch extends ViewObservable
This class implements a pseudo-Summary for client applications. It contains the same information as the Summary, but they're overwritten here in order to implement a new Observer-Observable paradigm specific for the View.

  • Constructor Summary

    • LightMatch

      public LightMatch​(Summary summary, View view)
      Constructor: initialize a LightMatch as a pseudo-Summary. Called at the beginning of the starting phase and after the reconnection.
      Parameters:
      summary - the Summary to copy
